name: Nutella® Bread Pudding
author: easma
summary: A delicious Nutella® spin on classic bread pudding!
ingredients: 6 slices bread, or more to taste
⅓ cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Butter a pie dish and set aside
Tear bread into 1- to 2-inch pieces and place in the bottom of the prepared pie dish
Combine evaporated milk, white sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl
Add melted butter to bread pieces in the pie dish and toss to combine
Melt chocolate-hazelnut spread in a microwave-safe bowl in a microwave to soften slightly, 15 to 30 seconds
Place dollops on top of bread mixture, spreading to make an even layer
Pour milk-egg mixture on top, making sure bread is completely covered
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 45 to 50 minutes
